person.persName: Cyrus Alley (Morgan County, Kentucky, deputy county court clerk)

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, deputy court clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy C. Hazelrigg in Morgan County, Kentucky, on September 12, 1860. Father of Benjamin Alley and Kate Alley. Deputy county court clerk in Morgan County in 1860. Deputy county court clerk in Morgan County in 1861.
